verses.kjv: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
verses.ct: The LORD spoke to Moses and said,

verses.kjv: On the first day of the first month shalt thou set up the tabernacle of the tent of the congregation.
verses.ct: "On the 1st day of the 1st month, you are to assemble the tabernacle, the tent of meeting.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt put therein the ark of the testimony, and cover the ark with the vail.
verses.ct: Place the ark of the testimony inside it, and screen the ark with the curtain.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt bring in the table, and set in order the things that are to be set in order upon it; and thou shalt bring in the candlestick, and light the lamps thereof.
verses.ct: Bring in the table and arrange everything on it properly. Then bring in the lampstand and light its lamps.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt set the altar of gold for the incense before the ark of the testimony, and put the hanging of the door to the tabernacle.
verses.ct: Position the gold incense altar in front of the ark of the testimony, and hang the screen at the entrance of the tabernacle.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt set the altar of the burnt offering before the door of the tabernacle of the tent of the congregation.
verses.ct: Place the altar for burnt offerings in front of the entrance to the tent of meeting.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt set the laver between the tent of the congregation and the altar, and shalt put water therein.
verses.ct: Set the basin between the tent of meeting and the altar, and fill it with water.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt set up the court round about, and hang up the hanging at the court gate.
verses.ct: Put up the surrounding courtyard and hang the curtain at the courtyard entrance.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt take the anointing oil, and anoint the tabernacle, and all that is therein, and shalt hallow it, and all the vessels thereof: and it shall be holy.
verses.ct: Then take the anointing oil and anoint the tabernacle and everything in it. Consecrate it along with all its equipment, and it will be holy.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt anoint the altar of the burnt offering, and all his vessels, and sanctify the altar: and it shall be an altar most holy.
verses.ct: Anoint the altar for burnt offerings and all its equipment. Consecrate the altar, and it will become most holy.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt anoint the laver and his foot, and sanctify it.
verses.ct: Anoint the basin and its stand, and consecrate it.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt bring Aaron and his sons unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation, and wash them with water.
verses.ct: Then bring Aaron and his sons to the entrance of the tent of meeting and wash them with water.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt put upon Aaron the holy garments, and anoint him, and sanctify him; that he may minister unto me in the priest’s office.
verses.ct: Dress Aaron in the sacred garments, anoint him, and consecrate him so that he can serve me as priest.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt bring his sons, and clothe them with coats:
verses.ct: Bring his sons forward and dress them in their tunics.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt anoint them, as thou didst anoint their father, that they may minister unto me in the priest’s office: for their anointing shall surely be an everlasting priesthood throughout their generations.
verses.ct: Anoint them just as you anointed their father, so they can serve me as priests. Their anointing will establish a permanent priesthood for all future generations."

verses.kjv: Thus did Moses: according to all that the LORD commanded him, so did he.
verses.ct: Moses did all of this. He carried out everything exactly as the LORD had instructed him.

verses.kjv: And it came to pass in the first month in the second year, on the first day of the month, that the tabernacle was reared up.
verses.ct: On the 1st day of the 1st month in the 2nd year, the tabernacle was set up.

verses.kjv: And Moses reared up the tabernacle, and fastened his sockets, and set up the boards thereof, and put in the bars thereof, and reared up his pillars.
verses.ct: Moses assembled the tabernacle by securing the bases, putting the frames in place, inserting the crossbars, and raising the posts.

verses.kjv: And he spread abroad the tent over the tabernacle, and put the covering of the tent above upon it; as the LORD commanded Moses.
verses.ct: He spread the tent over the tabernacle and placed its outer covering on top, just as the LORD had instructed Moses.

verses.kjv: And he took and put the testimony into the ark, and set the staves on the ark, and put the mercy seat above upon the ark:
verses.ct: He took the testimony and placed it inside the ark, attached the carrying poles to the ark, and set the mercy seat on top of it.

verses.kjv: And he brought the ark into the tabernacle, and set up the vail of the covering, and covered the ark of the testimony; as the LORD commanded Moses.
verses.ct: He brought the ark into the tabernacle, hung the screening curtain, and shielded the ark of the testimony from view, just as the LORD had instructed Moses.

verses.kjv: And he put the table in the tent of the congregation, upon the side of the tabernacle northward, without the vail.
verses.ct: He placed the table in the tent of meeting on the north side of the tabernacle, outside the curtain.

verses.kjv: And he set the bread in order upon it before the LORD; as the LORD had commanded Moses.
verses.ct: He arranged the bread on it in the LORD's presence, just as the LORD had instructed Moses.

verses.kjv: And he put the candlestick in the tent of the congregation, over against the table, on the side of the tabernacle southward.
verses.ct: He positioned the lampstand in the tent of meeting across from the table, on the south side of the tabernacle.

verses.kjv: And he lighted the lamps before the LORD; as the LORD commanded Moses.
verses.ct: He lit the lamps in the LORD's presence, just as the LORD had instructed Moses.

verses.kjv: And he put the golden altar in the tent of the congregation before the vail:
verses.ct: He placed the gold altar in the tent of meeting in front of the curtain.

verses.kjv: And he burnt sweet incense thereon; as the LORD commanded Moses.
verses.ct: He burned fragrant incense on it, just as the LORD had instructed Moses.

verses.kjv: And he set up the hanging at the door of the tabernacle.
verses.ct: He hung the screen at the entrance of the tabernacle.

verses.kjv: And he put the altar of burnt offering by the door of the tabernacle of the tent of the congregation, and offered upon it the burnt offering and the meat offering; as the LORD commanded Moses.
verses.ct: He positioned the altar for burnt offerings at the entrance of the tent of meeting and presented the burnt offering and the grain offering on it, just as the LORD had instructed Moses.

verses.kjv: And he set the laver between the tent of the congregation and the altar, and put water there, to wash withal.
verses.ct: He set the basin between the tent of meeting and the altar and filled it with water for washing.

verses.kjv: And Moses and Aaron and his sons washed their hands and their feet thereat:
verses.ct: Moses, Aaron, and his sons used it to wash their hands and feet.

verses.kjv: When they went into the tent of the congregation, and when they came near unto the altar, they washed; as the LORD commanded Moses.
verses.ct: Whenever they entered the tent of meeting or approached the altar, they washed, just as the LORD had instructed Moses.

verses.kjv: And he reared up the court round about the tabernacle and the altar, and set up the hanging of the court gate. So Moses finished the work.
verses.ct: He erected the courtyard around the tabernacle and the altar, and hung the curtain at the courtyard entrance. With that, Moses completed the work.

verses.kjv: Then a cloud covered the tent of the congregation, and the glory of the LORD filled the tabernacle.
verses.ct: Then a cloud covered the tent of meeting, and the glory of the LORD filled the tabernacle.

verses.kjv: And Moses was not able to enter into the tent of the congregation, because the cloud abode thereon, and the glory of the LORD filled the tabernacle.
verses.ct: Moses could not enter the tent of meeting because the cloud had settled on it, and the glory of the LORD filled the tabernacle.

verses.kjv: And when the cloud was taken up from over the tabernacle, the children of Israel went onward in all their journeys:
verses.ct: Whenever the cloud lifted from above the tabernacle, the Israelites would break camp and continue their journey.

verses.kjv: But if the cloud were not taken up, then they journeyed not till the day that it was taken up.
verses.ct: But if the cloud did not lift, they would not travel until the day it rose.

verses.kjv: For the cloud of the LORD was upon the tabernacle by day, and fire was on it by night, in the sight of all the house of Israel, throughout all their journeys.
verses.ct: The cloud of the LORD rested over the tabernacle during the day, and fire glowed within it at night, visible to the entire nation of Israel throughout all their travels.
